message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,300,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to both of us. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,100,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the value of the product to me.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I can't go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $1,150,000? This would still be a good deal for you, and I'd be happy to finalize the sale at that price.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'd be willing to go up to $1,080,000. Can you consider that?
